templates.name: How do I earn points?
templates.content:
Members start earning points as soon as they join! After earning those initial points, there are numerous ways to earn Mathis Rewards points. For every dollar you spend on merchandise, you'll receive 2 Mathis Rewards points. Members can also earn points on Social Media, writing reviews, meeting with Mathis Designers, and more! 
 
Checkout out our More Ways to Earn section here for more details: https://www.mathishome.com/rewards/mathis-rewards-program.html

templates.name: Can I redeem points online?
templates.content: Yes! Members will be able to redeem their points online very soon. In the meantime, you can chat with one of our online specialists via our website or call us at 844-294-3435 and we can help apply points to your order.

templates.name: How do I get my points and how soon can I use them?
templates.content:
Points earned on merchandise purchases are awarded and available to use 30 days after your items are delivered or picked up. Points earned from non-merchandise purchases are awarded within 5 business days (unless otherwise noted) and are available to use immediately. 
 
Please see our Terms and Conditions for more details on points: https://www.mathishome.com/s/mathisbrothers/rewards/mathis-rewards-terms.html#earningpoints

templates.name: Can a Mathis Rewards membership be canceled and refunded?
templates.content:
Memberships can be canceled at any time by contacting our customer service department, by using the following: (i) toll free number: (844) 294-3435, (ii) e-mail address: MathisRewards@MathisHome.com, or (iii) mailing address: 3434 West Reno, Oklahoma City, OK 73107, Attn: Mathis Rewards Membership. Membership fees are non-refundable. When a Membership is canceled, all Membership benefits will end, including but not limited to, eligibility to earn and redeem Points. 

Mathis Rewards members may opt out of auto-renewal by managing their account at www.MathisHome.com/login.  Members can also contact us by calling 844-294-3435 or by emailing MathisRewards@MathisHome.com. If a Member cancels automatic renewal, the current Membership remains active until the end of the annual membership period. If a membership is not scheduled to auto-renew, a Member can renew by paying in a Mathis store or calling (844) 294-3435 before the end of the annual membership period. 
 
For any additional information, please check out our website at https://www.mathishome.com/mathis-home or give us a call at 844-294-3435.

templates.name: How do I become a Mathis Rewards member?
templates.content: You can sign up for a Mathis Rewards membership online here: https://www.mathishome.com/rewards/mathis-rewards-program.html You can also reach out to your salesperson or call us at 844-294-3435 and let the representative know you'd like to become a Mathis Rewards member.

templates.name: Do I earn points on online purchases?
templates.content: Yes! Just log into your member account using your member email address and all points will be automatically tied to your account.

templates.name: How many points do I need to earn before I make a purchase?
templates.content: There is not a minimum point value to get a discount. You can use points as they become available or collect points over time for an even bigger discount!

templates.name: What is the value of each point and how do I redeem my points?
templates.content:
Members earn 2 points per dollar spent on eligible merchandise. Points earned may be used as a form of payment for future eligible purchases. 100 points = $1 discount. For example, spend $1000 on merchandise, earn 2000 points, and receive a $20 discount upon redemption. 
 
Members earn Points based on every whole dollar spent on an eligible purchase (excluding tax, shipping charges and fees) 30 days after the item(s) have been purchased and shipped. Points earned may be used as a discount against the amount owed for future eligible purchases. Points are not transferable and may not be sold, resold, exchanged or bartered. Points have no cash value and cannot be exchanged for cash. Points cannot be used to purchase gift cards or third-party services. Additional exclusions may apply. Please see our Terms & Conditions for more details: https://www.mathishome.com/rewards/mathis-rewards-terms.html#earningpoints

templates.name: Do my points expire?
templates.content: As long as you're an active member, points are good for 3 years from the time they are earned. For more details on points, please check out our Terms and Conditions: https://www.mathishome.com/s/mathisbrothers/rewards/mathis-rewards-terms.html#earningpoints

templates.name: What are the benefits of being a Mathis Rewards member?
templates.content: There are members only discounts on furniture, bedding and delivery, early access to sales, seasonal offers for members only, and extra points earning days. Members also have multiple ways to earn points which lead to more Member discounts! As a member's level of Membership increases, so do the benefits!
